meanings.definition: A device used to slow the descent of a person or object through the air by creating drag.
meanings.sent1: The parachutes opened smoothly, gently lowering the skydiver to the ground.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the parachutes before jumping out of the plane.
meanings.sent3: The parachutes decided to take a break and refused to open during the skydiving event.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as a parachute, slowing down the impact of his harsh words.
meanings.sent5: The colorful parachutes filled the sky, creating a beautiful spectacle.

meanings.sent1: He parachutes down from the plane with a big smile on his face.
meanings.sent2: They decided to parachute over the scenic valley for an unforgettable experience.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it could parachute from the top of the bookshelf like a superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence allowed her to parachute into the new job opportunity without fear.
meanings.sent5: The adventurer loved to parachute into unknown territories, seeking thrills.
